text: Hossein Dehlavi () (September 30, 1927 – October 15, 2019) was a Persian composer. He was born in Tehran. For ten years, Dehlavi was the director of and professor at the Persian National Music Conservatory in Tehran. In 1979, he wrote an opera for children called Mana and Mani. On October 15, 2019, Dehlavi died at his home in Tehran from Alzheimer’s disease-related problems at the age of 92. ==References== ==Other websites== * Hossein Dehlavi Official Website Category:1927 births Category:2019 deaths Category:Deaths from Alzheimer's disease Category:Iranian writers Category:Iranian composers Category:People from Tehran
title: Hossein Dehlavi
